Spawn() Spawngame.logic.tilespawner.JPiece game.logic.tilespawner.JPieceSpawn
ITileable game.logic.tilespawner.JPiece.Spawn ( )[inline]
Spawns a new tile and returns it.
Returns
A new instance of ITileable representing a blue tile.
This method creates a new tile object of type Tile with a blue color. It also logs a debug message to indicate that the spawn process has been initiated. The returned tile can be used in various game mechanics or visual representations within the application. Ensure that the appropriate context is set up for the tile to function correctly in the game environment.
Implements game.logic.tilespawner.ISpawnable.
